name: Shrewd Tactician
text: Your dealings with pirates, thieves, and assassins have taught you to be exceedingly careful.
benefit: Opponents do not gain a +2 bonus on attack rolls for flanking you, although they can still sneak attack you. You also gain a +3 bonus on Sense Motive checks made to resist a foe’s Bluff checks to feint in combat.
staminaText: When an opponent attempts a feint against you, you can spend up to 5 stamina points to increase the DC of the skill check made to feint by 1 per point of stamina spent.
text_zh: 你与海盗、窃贼和刺客相处的经验告诉你，万事皆需小心。
benefit_zh: 尽管你仍旧会由于夹击而被偷袭，但是敌人对你夹击时攻击检定不再获得+2加值。同时你在对抗敌人进行虚招而使用的唬骗检定时，察言观色检定获得+3加值。
staminaText_zh: 当一个敌人对你尝试虚招时，你可以消耗至多5点耐力来提升用于虚招的技能检定DC，每消耗1点耐力提升1点DC。
